problem.markdown:
1. What is the angle swept by connecting rod for l/r ratio 2?
() 30o (x) 60o () 90o () Data insufficient
2. Measured from +X-axis what is the angular position of connecting rod when at a crank position of 30o the crank shaft is perpendicular to connecting rod ?
() 160o () 60o (x) 120o () 150o
3. What is the max distance travelled by slider for a slider crank mechanism with crank length 10cm?
() 5cm (x) 20cm () None of these () 10cm
4. At which of the following crank angle position pairs is the slider at the same location
() 90o,270o (x) All of these () 120o,240o () 30o,330o
5. For a 5cm crank shaft rotating a 3rpm what is the average speed in cm/s of the slider?
(x) 1 () 4 () 3 () 2
problem.p: 1. What is the angle swept by connecting rod for l/r ratio 2?
2. Measured from +X-axis what is the angular position of connecting rod when at a crank position of 30o the crank shaft is perpendicular to connecting rod ?
3. What is the max distance travelled by slider for a slider crank mechanism with crank length 10cm?
4. At which of the following crank angle position pairs is the slider at the same location
5. For a 5cm crank shaft rotating a 3rpm what is the average speed in cm/s of the slider?
